title: User-Friendly Installation and Setup – Guided Setup Through Voice Prompts
summary: As a retired social worker, I want a guided setup process through voice prompts so that I can easily configure the ALFRED system without needing technical expertise, allowing me to focus on staying connected and managing my activities.

title: Intuitive Navigation and Interaction – Visual Cues for Navigation Assistance
summary: As an older adult, I want visual cues for navigation assistance so that I can easily understand and use the system without feeling overwhelmed by technology.

title: User-Controlled Consent for Data Sharing
summary: As an older adult, I want to have control over my personal and health information so that I can feel secure and empowered in using the ALFRED system without fearing data misuse.

title: Comprehensive Health Device Integration
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to integrate with my health-monitoring devices so that I can easily track my arthritis pain and receive timely reminders for my medication, ensuring I stay healthy and active.

title: Personalized Content and Recommendations for Social Engagement
summary: As a retired social worker, I want ALFRED to suggest local volunteering opportunities and social events based on my interests, so that I can stay socially connected and continue my community involvement despite my limited mobility.

title: Memory Aids for Daily Reminders
summary: As a retired social worker, I want cognitive support tools that help me remember important tasks and events so that I can manage my busy schedule and stay connected without feeling overwhelmed.

title: Ongoing User Support and Training - Access to a Help Desk Through Voice Commands
summary: As a retired social worker, I want to be able to access help and support through voice commands so that I can easily resolve issues and continue using ALFRED without feeling frustrated or overwhelmed by technology.
